attributes.action: to declare a motion of no confidence in the speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker has show a lack of respect to fellow MP’s and is no longer in control of his duties as an impartial Speaker of the House. He has shown that he has not grasped the need to monitor the expenses of members and has allowed it to disintegrate into one of the biggest fiasco of the House in the last 100 years. His attitude to public concern has been to tell the innocent MP’s to shut up when questioned about his priorities and investigate with urgency how this information became available in the public domain. He more than any other person is responsible for this mess.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
